commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice identity assign
commands.summary: Assign the user or system managed identities.
commands.syntax:
az healthcareapis deidservice identity assign --deid-service-name
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--mi-system-assigned]
                                              [--mi-user-assigned]
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice identity remove
commands.summary: Remove the user or system managed identities.
commands.syntax:
az healthcareapis deidservice identity remove --deid-service-name
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--mi-system-assigned]
                                              [--mi-user-assigned]
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice identity show
commands.summary: Show the details of managed identities.

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice identity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
